investigation.findings_summary: 135 failed attempts from known malicious IP; coordinated spray observed across multiple IPs

rationale: Confirmed credential access (T1110 Password Spray) against devops-vm with large failed login volume from a high-confidence malicious IP. Related spray activity from sibling IPs raises campaign likelihood and business risk to critical.
recommended_actions: Review authentication logs for any successful logins
Force password reset for targeted accounts
Assess exposure of SSH/RDP to internet
escalation_reason: P1 true positive affecting critical DevOps infrastructure
estimated_impact: HIGH: potential compromise of build pipelines, source code, and deployment credentials; possible supply-chain risk
